alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 3:17PM MST until August 23 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Yavapai County in west central Arizona... * Until 345 PM MST. * At 317 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Verde Village, or 10 miles northwest of Camp Verde, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clarkdale, Verde Village, Bridgeport, Cherry, Cottonwood, Jerome, Dead Horse Ranch State Park, Powell Springs Campground, Mingus Mountain Campground, Playground Group Campground, Potato Patch Campground and Tuzigoot National Monument. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
